events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The system has categorized this request under 'Refund' based on the customer's mention of refund and wrong item.
An agent from the billing and refunds team has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I will do my best to help you get a refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product that was delivered to me.
We have reviewed your photos and order details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and for handling my refund efficiently. I appreciate your help.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You should see the money credited back to your account soon.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the refund and to ensure there are no further issues with your order.
As there have been no further issues, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
